'Johannes Gerhardus Hendrikus Burgers (31 Jenụwarị 1870 - 12 Juun 1943) bụ na 1913 onye guzobere Burgers 'Dierenpark, nke a na-akpọ Royal Burgers Zoo n'oge a
Ọ bụ onye nwe ya na onye nduzi ya ruo 1939
Nwa ya nwanyị nke ikpeazụ bụ Lucie Burgers bụ onye nọchiri ya, ya na di ya bụ Reinier van Hooff
Nwa ha nwoke, Antoon van Hooff (1937-2004), mekwuru zoo ahụ.
A mụrụ Johan Burgers na 's-Heerenberg Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ọrụ aka, Burgers ghọrọ ọkachamara n'ọrụ ugbo na-arụ ọrụ na Eastern Europe nke nyere ya ezigbo ụgwọ ọrụ

Ọ laghachiri n'obodo ya ka ọ lụọ di, wee malite igbu anụ. Na 1895, Burgers zụtara ụlọ obodo na 's-Heerenberg. N'ogige ahụ, o debere nchịkọta nke anụ ọhịa na nkịta nke mere ka ọ nweta ọtụtụ ihe nrite, ma mee ka ọ zụta ọtụtụ anụmanụ
Iji kwado nchịkọta na-arịwanye elu, ọ zụtara ala dị nso ma kpọọ ya Buitenlust. Na 1908, ọ gara Tierpark Hagenbeck nke Carl Hagenbeck na Hamburg nke masịrị ya n'ezie.
Na 1913, Burgers meghere saịtị ahụ maka ọha na eze, ma tinye anụmanụ ndị ọzọ dị ka nkịta ọhịa, anụ ọhịa wolf na flamingos

Burgers Zoo bụ zoo ọha na eze mbụ nwere onwe ya na Netherlands, n'ihi na Natura Artis Magistra na Amsterdam bụ naanị maka ndị otu. Na 1916, Burgers chọrọ itinye ọdụm na anụ ọhịa bea nke gọọmentị obodo guzogidere. N'afọ 1918, obodo Arnhem nwere ịnụ ọkụ n'obi maka atụmatụ ya, e meghekwara zoo ahụ n'akụkụ Open Air Museum. Na 1932, nwa ya nwanyị Johanna lụrụ Johan van Glabbeek, ma dị ka onyinye agbamakwụkwọ o nyere ha Dierenpark Tilburg. Na 1939, Burgers lara ezumike nká ma họpụta nwa ya nwanyị Lucie dị ka onye ga-anọchi ya.
N'afọ ndị 1940, Burgers butere ọrịa kansa
Burgers nwụrụ na Arnhem na 12 June 1943.
Burgers lụrụ Maria Erwig ma ha mụrụ ụmụ atọ.
Jan van Hooff, ọkà mmụta ihe ndị dị ndụ na prọfesọ nke comparative physiology na Mahadum Utrecht bụ otu n'ime ụmụ ụmụ ya.
